metadata.synopsis: AD for Skoona at Elfsong Tavern
metadata.how_to_trigger: When Skoona reaches certain points in her behaviour (Back door, Taproom)

0.speaker: Enforcer Skoona
0.text: By Gruumsh! These customers look more ragged every day.

1.speaker: Enforcer Skoona
1.text: When my break comes, I'm going to play with the kitchen cats, I don't care what Revoor says.
